description: Enhances explanations through the use of analogies and metaphors. This decorator helps make complex or abstract concepts more accessible by systematically comparing them to more familiar domains or experiences.

parameters.name: domain
parameters.description: Specific domain or context to draw analogies from (if not specified, will choose appropriate domains)

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: Number of distinct analogies to provide

parameters.name: depth
parameters.description: Level of detail in developing the analogy

examples.description: Single analogy from a specific domain
examples.usage:
+++Analogical(domain=sports)
Explain how the immune system works.
examples.result: Explains the immune system using extended sports analogies, comparing immune cells to players, pathogens to opponents, etc.

examples.description: Multiple brief analogies from different domains
examples.usage:
+++Analogical(count=3, depth=brief)
Describe how blockchain technology functions.
examples.result: Provides three different brief analogies for blockchain from different domains (perhaps physical ledgers, chain of custody, and distributed networks)
